originalText.text: Dr Jin is my most favorite doctor, her bedside manner is wonderful - she always makes time to discuss my wellbeing during my visits. She delivered my babies almost a decade ago. She saved a friend's life, I trust her implicitly.

text.text: Dr Jin is my most favorite doctor, her bedside manner is wonderful - she always makes time to discuss my wellbeing during my visits. She delivered my babies almost a decade ago. She saved a friend's life, I trust her implicitly.

originalText.text: Dr.Jin and her staff members are very professional, shows a great level of care for their patients.  I would recommend her to anyone that needs an amazing OBGYN. She is very detailed oriented and pays attention to detail that you would want from any doctor. Always a pleasant visit, never felt rushed. Dr. Jin is simply the best!

text.text: Dr.Jin and her staff members are very professional, shows a great level of care for their patients.  I would recommend her to anyone that needs an amazing OBGYN. She is very detailed oriented and pays attention to detail that you would want from any doctor. Always a pleasant visit, never felt rushed. Dr. Jin is simply the best!

originalText.text: Dr. Jin hands down is the best obgyn I have ever had and in my opinion the best at Weill Cornell. I really believed if I had another ob my baby would’ve been a c-section. As a first time mom Dr. Jin addressed all my concerns throughout my pregnancy, she was also very proactive at all times and always a step ahead for all treatments I needed along the way. She diagnosed me with gestational diabetes at 10 weeks! She didn’t wait for me to hit 26 weeks in order for me to start controlling my glucose level. I believe that proactive decision was what helped me take control early enough to have a healthy birth. As per the birth experience with dr. Jin I would do it all over again. Throughout my pregnancy I heard a lot of horror birth stories of how doctors just do c sections because they want to get rid of you and cash a check. How doctors don’t listen and respect your decisions throughout labor. I had a natural birth because my doctor was Dr. Jin I’m a firm believer of that. She gave me the best pep talk to encourage me that my body was made for this and that I can do it. I pushed for 40 mins and my baby was out. I live out of state and I traveled to have my baby with Dr. Jin because I didn’t trust no other doctor and she did not disappoint at all! She promised me on my first prenatal visit that she would be delivering my baby and she kept that promise I have never heard of or seen that before. If your a first time mom having Dr. Jin as your ob will make you think birth is an easy and pleasant experience. I have the best birth story because she was my doctor. I will forever be grateful for her.

originalText.text: The most amazing Doctor. Somehow she manages it all! She keeps visits brief, quick and efficient but you never, ever feel rushed in the office. The wait time is always minimal in the office too which is a huge plus. The hospital experience with her could not be better as well. As others have stated, she is so experienced and very quick to recommend what is best allowing you to make informed decisions and keep the process moving. Ask the hospital and nursing staff their opinion of her too, she is simply the best.

originalText.text: This review is strictly about delivery. Dr. Jin was not my OBGYN but she was the doctor on call when I went into labor. I spoke with her on the phone and she was the one to deliver my first child. She was encouraging and pushed me to give it my all in the delivery room! I was so nervous not to have my own OBGYN but felt she was a blessing for me and my family.
